text: Vannevar Bush ( ; March 11, 1890 – June 28, 1974) was an American engineer, inventor and science administrator. He is known in engineering for his work on analog computers, for founding Raytheon, and for the memex. Bush died of pneumonia in Belmont, Massachusetts, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *Vannevar Bush papers, 1901–1974 *Vannevar Bush papers, 1910–1988 *MIT Museum *1995 MIT/Brown Vannevar Bush Symposium – Complete Video Archive *The Vannevar Bush Index at the Franklin D. Roosevelt Presidential Library and Museum * *Pictures of Vannevar Bush from the Tufts Digital Library *National Academy of Sciences Biographical Memoir Category:1890 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:American inventors Category:Scientists from Massachusetts
title: Vannevar Bush
